ihavesex: Obscure any personal information. This includes last names and usernames. Notable public figures are excluded from this rule.
oldpeoplefacebook: The following information must be redacted: Profile pictures, last names, cities/towns, identifying photos on private pages, personal informtion.
ScottishPeopleTwitter: Keep personal information to a minimum. Mods reserve the right to remove posts and/or request personal information to be edited out at our own discretion.
ProgrammerHumor: Remember rule 0; if you don't understand this go look it up, it's a lot of text.
